title: Tests should not ignore all leaking threads and instead just ignore the known leaking threads.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content: The only tests ignoring all leaked threads are hdfs tests and a security zk test. This patch moves to just allowing the known issues and each issue is linked to a JIRA.
